name: Amazônia
description:
You were flying a plane, and due to an engine failure you had to make an emergency landing in the middle of the Amazon jungle. You survived, and now you must find a way to escape the numerous traps and surprises that a trip through the jungle reserves for these "fortunate ones". Good luck, my friend...

Thus began the player's journey through Amazônia, the first Brazilian game, released in its initial version in August 1983. In these last three decades, the adventure set in the Amazon jungle continued to be improved and made available to players on different computers. Its importance to the history of electronic games in Brazil is inestimable, and its influence on the national industry cannot be measured.
